subject: Tennis
Sex Crimes
Apologies
Football
lead_paragraph: Williams said she would apologize to the family of the victim in the Steubenville rape case after she was quoted in a Rolling Stone article saying the girl “shouldn’t have put herself in that position.”
snippet: Williams said she would apologize to the family of the victim in the Steubenville rape case after she was quoted in a Rolling Stone article saying the girl “shouldn’t have put herself in that position.”
